translation.bible_verse: For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them. - Matthew 18:20
translation.notify_members_hint: Send an email to all church members to inform them about this new event
translation.confirm_mark_as_completed: Are you sure you want to mark this event as completed and archive it?
translation.confirm_delete_event: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This action is irreversible.
translation.confirm_delete_event_message: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete this event? All associated data, including registrations, will be permanently lost. This action cannot be undone.
translation.confirm_mark_completed_message: Are you sure you want to mark this event as completed and archive it? This will make the event inaccessible for new registrations.
translation.you_are_checked_in_for: You are checked in for the event:
translation.bible_verse_checkin: For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them. - Matthew 18:20
translation.event_intro_phrase: You are about to register for the event:
translation.labels_are_required: French and English labels are required.
translation.confirm_delete_field: Are you sure you want to delete this field?
translation.no_custom_fields_yet: No custom fields created yet for this event.
translation.name_and_email_are_required_in_form: A field for 'name' and a field of type 'email' are required in the form definition.
translation.permissions_hint: Select the modules this administrator will have access to. Choose 'None' to remove all access without deleting the member.
translation.user_created_and_invited: User created and invitation sent by email
translation.team_permissions_note: Invited administrators will receive an email with their login credentials. They will only be able to access the modules they have permissions for. Use 'No permission' to remove access without deleting the member.
translation.only_main_admin_can_manage_team: Only the main administrator can manage the team.
translation.no_module_access: No module access. Contact the main administrator.
translation.activity_logs_subtitle: History of actions performed by administrators
translation.only_main_admin_can_view_logs: Only the main administrator can view activity logs.
translation.activity_logs_note: Activity logs are kept for traceability and security purposes. They allow tracking all actions performed by administrators.
translation.confirm_remove_user_from_church: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the church team?
translation.confirm_remove_user_message: Are you sure you want to remove "{{name}}" from the team? This person will lose access to assigned modules.
